description: The function is vulnerable to SQL Injection (CWE-89) as it directly uses user input in database queries without proper sanitization or parameterization. It is also vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) (CWE-79) as it does not properly sanitize user input before using it in the application's response. Additionally, the function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) (CWE-352) as it does not implement any CSRF protection mechanism, allowing an attacker to trick a victim into performing actions without their consent.
